ARTIST.title-expert: Expert in UX/UI Design & Front-End Development
ARTIST.expert-ux:
Creativity and precision define my work ‚Äî I am a pixel-perfect UX/UI designer with a passion for crafting immersive digital experiences. Inspired by the surreal universe of Magritte and the bold aesthetics of GTA , I bring a unique artistic touch to my designs, blending 2D and 3D visuals with a deep focus on user experience.

My key skills and expertise:
ARTIST.skill-1: üé® UX/UI Design: Focus on user-centered, interactive, and aesthetic interfaces.
ARTIST.skill-2: üñåÔ∏è Interactive Prototyping with Figma, Adobe XD, Zeplin, and Illustrator for engaging and dynamic mockups.
ARTIST.skill-3: üî≥ 2D & 3D Design: Logo creation, 3D modeling, and immersive visual experiences with 3ds Max.
ARTIST.skill-4: üíª Front-End Development: Expertise in Angular, React.js, Vue.js, TypeScript, SCSS, SASS.
ARTIST.skill-5: üì± Responsive & Animated UI: Ensuring smooth interactions and seamless performance across devices.
ARTIST.expert-last:
I hold a Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science from the University of Namur (graduated with distinction), combining technical expertise with a deep understanding of design.

One of my most exciting projects was developing a chatbot for an escape game as part of my Master‚Äôs thesis‚Äîdemonstrating my ability to merge design and technology to create engaging digital experiences.
ARTIST.music:
I am deeply passionate about music and have been playing the piano since the age of 10. As a vocalist, I am fortunate to be coached by Aurore, a talented artist who excelled at the conservatory and closely mentors my singing journey.

I enjoy performing covers of renowned artists such as Celine Dion, Lady Gaga, Mariah Carey, and Phil Collins. My dedication to music is driven by a love for bringing emotion and creativity to every note I play or sing.

You can find some of my covers on Instagram and YouTube. Check out the link in the footer!
ARTIST.aboutme: Curious about who I am? Explore my journey, the languages I speak, and my passion for music through piano and singing. Dive deeper into what drives me and how it influences both my work and creativity.
ARTIST.writetome: Feel free to get in touch with me for collaboration opportunities or inquiries. I'm always open to discuss new projects and share ideas. Let's create something amazing together!
ARTIST.animal-1:
Animal welfare is a cause close to my heart. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Every day, associations and volunteers work tirelessly to improve the lives of abandoned animals. Their dedication is admirable, yet too many cats and dogs are still left to fend for themselves without a sustainable solution.
ARTIST.animal-2: One of the key solutions to this issue is sterilization. The overpopulation of stray cats is difficult to manage, leading to unnecessary suffering. Sterilization is a simple but crucial step in preventing this problem and improving animal welfare.
ARTIST.animal-3: We should also consider the condition of horses used for tourist rides. Instead of exploiting these animals for entertainment, motorized alternatives exist that can prevent their physical suffering.
ARTIST.animal-4: Animals are not just companions; they feel fear, pain, and deserve our respect. Everyone can play a role in their well-being by adopting more responsible behaviors.
ARTIST.animal-5:
I have personally adopted two cats, Batman and Lisa, who bring so much joy to my life.
On this topic, I highly recommend the film Flow, a silent yet deeply moving piece that beautifully portrays the sensitivity of animals. The black cat in the movie reminds me so much of my Batman, a loyal and charismatic companion!
ARTIST.animal-6:
To learn more about feline overpopulation and GAIA‚Äôs campaign, you can visit this link: GAIA Campaign

üêæ
ARTIST.human-1:
A simple smile costs nothing and can brighten someone's day. üòä

In a world where many struggle with poverty and injustice, every action counts.
It is essential to think of others and take action, even in small ways, to create a more compassionate future.
ARTIST.human-2:
Thousands of organizations work every day to improve the lives of those in need.
Even a small donation can make a real difference. Here are some organizations striving for a better world:
  • UNICEF - Supporting children and their rights.
  • SOS Children's Villages - Protecting and educating vulnerable children.
  • Red Cross - Emergency relief and humanitarian aid.
ARTIST.human-3:
Our planet also needs us. üåç Small, simple actions can have a big impact:
  • Throwing waste in the bin instead of littering.
  • Turning off the water while soaping up in the shower to avoid waste.
  • Reducing food waste by adjusting portion sizes.
ARTIST.human-4:
Helping others and protecting the environment isn‚Äôt difficult. Let‚Äôs work together to be kinder and more responsible.

‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you for these small actions that, combined, can change the world.
